title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' issue found in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
OB: When selecting a package in a project and choosing the 'copy' option from the context menu, the destination is displayed incorrectly as xxx instead of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.
EB: The destination should be displayed as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of xxx in the 'copy package' functionality.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project.
2. Open the package viewer and select a package in the project (e.g. from the context menu).
3. Choose the 'copy' option from the context menu.
4. Verify that the destination shown is xxx instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
